title: What is safe mode?
answer:
Android versions 4.0 and above include the safe mode feature. In safe mode, the system only loads basic features or preloaded applications. 

 After installing third-party apps on your phone, if the new apps are incompatible with your system, the phone may not switch on or may experience errors after startup. If you encounter such issues, you can enter safe mode to see if your phone's basic functions still work. You can then troubleshoot and remove any incompatible third-party apps.
